pkgmetadata.longdescription: Two-Dimensional Sociometric Status Determination with Rating Scales // A set of functions for two-dimensional sociometric status determination with rating scales. For each person assessed, SSrat computes probability distributions of the total scores for `Sympathy' (S), `Antipathy' (A), social `Preference' (P) and social `Impact' (I), and applies a set of criteria for sociometric status categorization.
